message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product at a price that I think is a great value for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. However, $18,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only consider a price closer to $10,000.

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob, but $10,000 is a bit below my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll make a counteroffer of $14,000. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great value for you.

Hello Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. While $14,000 is closer to what I had in mind, it's still a bit of a stretch for my budget. Would you consider $11,000? That would be a fair compromise.

I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob, but $11,000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll meet you at $13,000. This is as low as I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
